jobDescription: Waterworks - inspiring great design, and great people. Join the Nation’s leading luxury brand for bath and kitchen as a Waterworks Sales Consultant. The Sales Consultant role at Waterworks is a combination of inside and outside sales driving growth and market share while building strong relationships with architects, the design community and retail clients. The right candidate will combine their passion for sales and luxury design within a structured sales environment that provides Consultants the tools they need to be successful.  As a Waterworks brand ambassador, Sales Consultants model the Waterworks values of leadership, fearless sales strategies, a customer-centric approach, and a passion for the Waterworks products.  True to Waterworks roots, we value and cultivate long-standing relationships with our clients and our associates. We work in a highly collaborative, creative environment that values each associate’s contribution toward delivering beautiful, innovative, luxury products while providing superior customer service. We offer our associates training on all three brands under the Waterworks umbrella, career growth opportunities, competitive salaries, bonus potential, and a comprehensive benefits package including 401k.
